search_title: Nimara nombere y'ibyangombwa byawe, nombere y'umunyamuryango wawe cyangwa amajwi yawe na none aha haboneka indi rumuri.
search_input_placeholder: Nimara nombere y'ibyangombwa byawe, nombere y'umunyamuryango wawe cyangwa amajwi yawe
transit_limit_exceeded: Ibikoresho byubatswe mu mazu na mazu
description_no_info: Ishinjirwa ry'agasegulikirwa ryanditswe, ahubwo igiciro cyashinjywe ntihabonetse mbere yo kubonwa.
description_pre_transit: Umuryango wako ahuriye neza itangazo ry'igategetswe, ahubwo ntibahise bagakorera.
description_delivery_in_progress: Igategetswe ryawe rifashe iyi cyumweru muri teraheza ye kandi ritangira gukorwa.
description_in_transit: Igategetswe ryawe ribura ku isonga ryayo. Wibuke ko utawe uzabona ingano zitabaye umurongo wawe urigendera ku isonga ryayo.
description_customs_clearance: Igategetswe ryawe ritangira kuburirwaho n'inyandiko zabatwara (Ikibazo cyangwa ko ngerageza) cyangwa kudufasha kwemeza ikiguzi (imisoro/impofo). Nyamara uwo mutwara wabuze cyangwa warafasha, subira imbere cyane ko kugirango urangize ubwinshi bwawe.
description_return_to_sender: Igategetswe ryakoreshejwe ntiryashyizwe muri bose ndetse na nyuma y'urubuga rwo kuvugururwa ryakoreshejwe gutaha kuri we.
description_expired: Igategetswe ryawe nta kindi ikiganza cyangwa imirimo iragenda kubonwa kwa cyumweru gihera 30 ukoreshejwe gishyirwaho.
description_transit_limit_exceeded: Igategetswe ryabaye ariko haba ikizerezi wafashwe. Mushobora kwandika umwihariko.
description_unsuccessful_delivery: Umuryango wahawe ijambo akabona ko yibukije bishobora gukorwa ndetse atangira gukurikira rero.
description_error: Ntawundi murongo igategetswe ntituri kuri andika igihe kuri ibyo byose. Mushingiha ko mumwere abandi murongorwa.
description_exception: Ntibishoboka kureba ijambo ry'ubutumwa bwa bose cyangwa se nyuma ya kubikorera. Mushyingihe abandi murongorwa.
description_cancelled: Iyo umukiriya yamufashije kwandika atari yaranzwe.
description_available_for_pickup: Iyo parike riri muri iki kigo cy'abakozi bavuze ko rindwiye gutuma kugira ngo ubone.
no_numbers:
Ntibemerewe inyandiko.
Subira usubireho waba ufite icyo gihe cyangwa wasabwe uruhusha ku icyo ushaka.
no_trackings:
Ntibemerewe akazi. :)
Ibyacu birerwa aho ashyizwe ku bijyanye n'umubiri wacu.
Ese usangamo imyirondoro yawe
